statements: SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, origin_airport, destination_airport FROM flights;
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE airline_name = 'Delta';
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT airline_name, MIN(departure_time) AS earliest_departure FROM flights GROUP BY airline_name ORDER BY earliest_departure ASC;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE flight_number = 'ABC123';
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, origin_airport, destination_airport FROM flights WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT airline_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_flights FROM flights GROUP BY airline_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT flight_number, airline_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE origin_airport = 'JFK' AND destination_airport = 'LAX';
SELECT flight_number, airline_name, arrival_time - departure_time AS actual_duration FROM flights WHERE flight_duration IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT airline, departure_city, destination_city FROM flights;
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights;
SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, seat_number FROM passengers;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'New York';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT flight_id, airline, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE destination_city = 'London';
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE age > 30 AND seat_number LIKE 'A%';
SELECT passenger_id, first_name, last_name, flight_id FROM passengers WHERE flight_id IN (SELECT flight_id FROM flights WHERE airline = 'Delta');
SELECT * FROM flight_data;
SELECT flight_id, airline_code, departure_airport FROM flight_data ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT aircraft_model, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture FROM aircraft_data WHERE capacity > 200;
SELECT name, age, experience_years FROM pilot_data WHERE license_type = 'Commercial';
SELECT * FROM flight_data WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01' AND departure_airport = 'JFK';
SELECT * FROM flight_data WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK';
SELECT flight_id, airline_code, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM flight_data WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT airline_code, flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_data WHERE arrival_airport = 'LAX' AND departure_time < '2022-06-01';
SELECT airline_code, flight_number, departure_airport, arrival_airport, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_data WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01';
SELECT DISTINCT airline_code FROM flight_data WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK';
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT aircraft_type, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM flights;
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE status='On Time';
SELECT aircraft_type, manufacturer, model FROM aircrafts ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT airport_name, city, country FROM airports WHERE timezone_offset > 0;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT flight_number, aircraft_type, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM flights WHERE departure_time >= '2022-01-01' AND departure_time <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY departure_time;
SELECT aircraft_type, model, seating_capacity FROM aircrafts WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010 ORDER BY aircraft_type ASC, model DESC;
SELECT airport_code, airport_name, city, country FROM airports WHERE timezone_offset < 0 ORDER BY country ASC, city ASC, airport_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, hours_flown FROM pilots WHERE hours_flown > 1000 ORDER BY hours_flown DESC, last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FlightData
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, aircraft_type FROM FlightData ORDER BY flight_id DESC
SELECT passenger_name, age, nationality FROM PassengerData WHERE age > 30
SELECT crew_name, role, experience_years FROM CrewData WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY experience_years ASC
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceData WHERE maintenance_cost > 5000
SELECT * FROM FlightData WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK';
SELECT passenger_name, age, nationality FROM PassengerData ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT aircraft_type, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM MaintenanceData WHERE maintenance_cost > 10000;
SELECT crew_name, role, experience_years FROM CrewData WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY experience_years ASC;
SELECT flight_id, departure_date, arrival_date FROM FlightData WHERE departure_date < '2022-09-01';
